io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core.utils

Class PdbTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core.utils.PdbTools

  • public class PdbTools
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to perform operations on PDB and SIFTS files related to PdbBind Datasets
    Author:
    Ammar Ammar

    • Method Detail

      • configureReader

        public static org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.PDBFileReader configureReader(boolean alignSeqAndPraseSS)
        A method to configure a PDB file reader
        Parameters:
        alignSeqAndPraseSS - boolean value to specify if secondary structure info need to be parsed and if SEQRES sequence and ATOM sequence need to be aligned when reading a PDB file
        Returns:
        a PDB file reader

      • parsePDBbindEntriesFromFile

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PDBbindEntry> parsePDBbindEntriesFromFile(java.lang.String path)
        A method to parse PDBbindEntry from a PsbBind dataset TSV file and store the results in a map
        Parameters:
        path - of the PdbBind dataset TSV file
        Returns:
        a map with PDB ID as a key and PDBbindEntry as a value

      • getAminoAcidsFromStructure

        public static java.util.List<org.biojava.nbio.structure.AminoAcid> getAminoAcidsFromStructure(org.biojava.nbio.structure.Structure structure)
        A static method to extract AminoAcids from a BioJava Structure object and store the in a List
        Parameters:
        structure - as a BioJava Structure object
        Returns:
        a list of AminoAcids extracted from the structure

      • getSiftsEntitiesForPDB

        public static java.util.List<org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.sifts.SiftsEntity> getSiftsEntitiesForPDB(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String pdb)
        Get a list of Sifts entities from the SIFTS file corresponding to a PdbBind PDB ID
        Parameters:
        path - of the downloaded SIFTS files
        pdb - which is the ID for the PDB needed to get its SIFTS
        Returns:
        a list of SIFTS entities for a specfic PDB ID

      • getSiftResiduesFromSiftsMapping

        public static java.util.List<org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.sifts.SiftsResidue> getSiftResiduesFromSiftsMapping(java.util.List<org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.sifts.SiftsEntity> siftsEntities)
        A method to extract SIFTS residues from SIFTS entities list and store them in a List
        Parameters:
        siftsEntities - a List of entities extracted from a SIFTS file for a certain PDB
        Returns:
        a list of SIFTS residues

      • downloadSifts

        public static java.lang.String downloadSifts(java.lang.String path,
                                             java.lang.String outputFolderPath)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        A method to download SIFTS files from URLs provided in a file
        Parameters:
        path - a string to the input file containing the SIFTS URLs to download
        outputFolderPath - a string to the output folder where SIFTS file will be downloaded
        Returns:
        a String of the download command exit status (success, failure)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown exception
